entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow late this afternoon. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then north 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Blowing snow this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming light late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023
